content:
I made a draft of a page to add a page to the new website that lists some current plans: https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/blob/plan/www/content/plans.md

I figure it would save time to have a central place to link people to, because some of these things are currently only knowable if you've been active on Zulip for awhile :big_smile:
Probably should mention removal of the hosted module and switching to effect interpreters.

Under "planned breaking changes" it says

These are changes that are both planned and planned to be backwards-compatible

I think you mean _not_ to be backwards compatible?

That was very helpful to me, I didn't know about the module Params proposal and it was super interesting read. I think it definitely addresses my largest concern with roc and does it in a way that seems super powerful. I'm excited to see it in practice :)
